title: The boy, the mole, the fox, the horse... and the unlikely 56-year-old Instagram star
text:
Ask the artist Charlie Mackesy how he likes spending his time when he’s not drawing, and he’ll tell you that it’s hanging upside down, hooking his legs over branches. “The problem with making art is that it’s really static,” he explains, when I look a little surprised about his acrobatics.

Sitting opposite him, with a slither of his tummy exposed by wrongly done-up shirt buttons, and his rescue dog Barney nestled on his lap, it occurs to me that he might be the most unlikely kind of social media influencer. No kind of filter could disguise the used mugs littered around his Brixton home where he draws from, the piles of paper and books carpeting the floor, or the garden over-spilling with tangled...
description: Ask the artist Charlie Mackesy how he likes spending his time when he’s not drawing, and he’ll tell you that it’s hanging upside down, hooking his legs over branches.
